snippet.title: Smipat and the Lost Bones Playtesttrailer
snippet.description:
Play and wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1838240/Smipat_and_the_Lost_Bones/
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/8jXNQM3uMC

In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

Description
Smipat and the Lost Bones ​is a 2D Action RPG with leveling, Hack & Slash elements and puzzles. The game is greatly inspired by the old Legend of Zelda games.

WARNING
This game is in early stages of develeopment. The playtest might contain some bugs. Keep in mind there will be a lot of changes in the future.

Current Playtest content
- 7 (temporary) test levels
- 4 Playable items: The Bone, Bonehamer, Bonebomb and Bone & Arrow.
- 3 Types of enemies: Basic slime, Mouse and Spider.
- 1 Boss: the Slime King, King Slime "Yes very orginal"
- 2 Environments: Graveyard and Dungeon
- A few interactable objects. Like pressure plates, levers and doors.
- Built-in Bugreportsystem
- Built-in Feedbacksystem

Roadmap
Graveyard -} Dungeon -} Cave -} Natures Sanctuary -} Sky Tower -} Sand Temple -} Ice and Fire Temple -} Swamp -} Dark Temple -} End Temple

Future Content
- A total of 10 unique items with each it's own use for puzzles
- A progressive leveling system
- Gear that makes you stronger and more resistant
- Talents to change your way of playing
- A total of 10 epic boss battles
- More than 30 enemies with each its own small mechanics
- A total of 12 environment types

#smipatandthelostbones
